title: Congruences involving cubes of central binomial coefficients. (arXiv:2210.17255v2 [math.NT] UPDATED)
description: Let $p$ be an odd prime and $m\in\{1,-8,16,-64,256,-512,4096\}$. In this paper, we obtain the congruences for $\sum_{k=0}^{(p-1)/2} \binom{2k}k^3\frac{w(k)}{m^k}$ modulo $p^2$, where $w(k)\in\{k^2,k^3,\frac 1{k+1},\frac 1{(k+1)^2},$ $\frac 1{(k+1)^3}, \frac 1{2k-1},\frac 1{(2k-1)^2},\frac 1{k+2}\}$.
dc:creator: Zhi-Hong Sun
